name: RIT DOT WAV
description:
Original submission to Godot Wild Jam #50
Your pilgrimage to the Center City is blocked by ritual audio challenges.

DOWNLOAD for the best experience! Web build has audio syncing issues.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD.

Spacebar for skipping text.

Pixel Art: CatGutsNightmare
